name: (Un)detected
description:
This is (Un)detected, a game created for Weekly Game Jam #91,  where you avoid getting spotted by cameras. If you get spotted, you enter a typing minigame where you type out detective/crime related words.

This game was created by a small team of aspiring learning game developers from a school called CART. We've only been programming for about a year and a half, and we love it a lot!
